fr.escape.game.entity.notifier

Interface EdgeNotifier

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    EntityContainer

    public interface EdgeNotifier

    A Component used to detect when a Entity exceed the World Edge and need to be removed.

    For detecting, use the isInside(Rectangle) method.

    For removing, use the edgeReached(Entity) method.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean edgeReached(Entity e)
      Notify the Component that we need to remove this Entity
      boolean isInside(java.awt.Rectangle edge)
      Check if the Entity Edge is inside the World Edge.

    • Method Detail

      • edgeReached

        boolean edgeReached(Entity e)
        Notify the Component that we need to remove this Entity
        Parameters:
        e - Entity
        Returns:
        True if removing is successful

      • isInside

        boolean isInside(java.awt.Rectangle edge)
        Check if the Entity Edge is inside the World Edge.
        Parameters:
        edge - Entity Edge
        Returns:
        True if the Entity Edge is inside World Edge
